patthana17.19:4.1: Kusalo ajjhatto dhammo naajjhattassa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.19:4.3: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā nava, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte cha, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana17.19:5.1: Kusalo bahiddhā dhammo nabahiddhā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.19:5.3: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte cha, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana17.19:6.1: Kusalaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.19:6.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana17.19:7.1: Kusalaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.19:7.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
